text: 5. Check Status of Web Server? import java.net.*; public class WebsiteTest { public static void main (Stringl[]l args) { try { InetAddress ia =InetAddress.getByName ("www. javals.com") ; boolean reachable = ia.isReachable (2000) ; if (reachable) System.out.println("Website Server is Online"); else System.out.println("Website Server is Down..."); } catch (Exception ex) { System.out.println(" Can't find the IP "); } } }
